hero.subtitle: STORY
hero.title: Decipher Complexity Reconstruct Resilience
hero.description: Risk is the shadow of connectivity. I seek to define the boundaries of system safety amidst the chaos of evolution.

items.title: System Complexity & Cascading Failures
items.description: Moving beyond single-facility perspectives to explore coupling between heterogeneous networks (e.g., energy, transport). Investigating risk propagation and identifying 'critical nodes' that trigger system collapse.

items.title: Data-Driven Resilience Assessment
items.description: Models require empirical grounding. Leveraging multi-source heterogeneous data (spatiotemporal trajectories, sensor logs) to construct dynamic resilience metrics, making 'safety' quantifiable.

items.title: Emergency Management & Optimization
items.description: Shifting from 'predicting risk' to 'managing risk'. Combining operations research to devise optimal recovery strategies under extreme constraints and incomplete information.

items.label: Systems Thinking
items.text: The whole exceeds the sum of its parts; focusing on non-linear emergence.

items.label: Computational Social Science
items.text: Revisiting traditional public management issues through a computational lens.

items.label: Pragmatism
items.text: The goal of scholarship is not just publication, but providing logical support for real-world decisions.

product.subtitle: CURRENT THOUGHTS
product.title: On 'Digitalization' & 'Academic Tools'
product.description: Beyond risk research, I focus on tools for scientific efficiency. Excellent tools shouldn't just pile up features; they should extend the flow of thought, helping researchers stay clear-headed amidst information overload.

philosophy.description: Research is a long ascent. If you are interested in complex systems or risk decision-making, or wish to discuss data and topics, I welcome the exchange.
